member.synopsis:
Martin Stagg
I am currently a Police Officer with Suffolk Constabulary. My service will be complete in April 2012 after 25 years. I previously served in HM Forces (Army) where I completed nine yearsâ€™ service as an Armoured Fighting Vehicle Crewman.
I am seeking work as a Professional Driver. In addition to my main employment as a Police Officer during 2011 I have worked voluntarily for the Forestry Commission, as a Forest Ranger. In addition to assisting in tasks involving visitors to the Forest, this role requires practical skills of a varied nature requiring a degree of physical fitness.
Personal information I hold a full licence to drive vehicles of category H-B-BE-C1-C1E and D1. (Prov C). I have received advanced training in relation to licence category B, whilst in the Police, which included 3.5 tonne van / personnel carriers. Whilst working for the Forestry Commission I regularly drive a transit sized vehicle. I passed the LGV Theory test in Dec 2011 and have further training in Jan 2012 in respect of a full C licence. Recently I have undertaken tuition for 7.5 tonne driving, and have arranged CPC training for early 2012. I am a UK citizen. I hold advanced vetting status, and have undergone a CRB check on behalf of the Forestry Commission. First Aid training has been included in my Forestry Commission role, and I hold a current, valid certificate. I am available as required, until 27 April 2012, when I would be available at any time. Short notice would not be a barrier.
